description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Project_Budget_TemplateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_Budget_TemplateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_Budget_TemplateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The Project Budget Template to edit.

Project_Budget_Template_Data.description: Selecting this will cause all existing lines for this Project Budget Template to be replaced with the lines defined here.
The Project Budget Template being processed
Enter a unique Project Budget Template name.

Budget_StructureObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Project_Budget_Template_Data.description: The Plan Structure that this Project Budget Template is based on.  This will determine which budget dimensions may be used.

validation.validation: Specify a plan structure that doesn't have virtual children.
Specify a plan structure that doesn't include company hierarchy dimensions.
Specify a plan structure defined as a Project plan type.
You can't select a different plan structure when editing.

Project_Budget_Template_Data.description: Select to override the values in the template with project-related worktags when you create plan lines.
Set to True to inactivate this Project Budget Template

validation.validation: You can't inactivate this template as it's on a Plan Calculation Type.

Project_Budget_Template_Line_Data.description: Selecting this will cause the referenced Project Budget Template Line to be deleted.

validation.validation: Valid ID must be provided when Delete flag is set.

validation.validation: If Delete is set to true, Replace All must be set to false.
validation.description: If Delete is set to true, Replace All must be set to false.

Project_Budget_Template_Line_Data.description: The worktag Budget Dimensions to apply to this Project Budget Template Line

validation.validation: You can only specify one value for each worktag type per line. These worktag types have multiple values: [worktag type].
You can't specify Project, Project Phase, Project Task or Company.
These worktag types must be included for the specified plan structure: [worktag types].

There are lines with inactive worktags. 
Remove the inactive worktags or select Allow Inactive Worktags on Plan lines on the Plan Structure [budget_structure].
Inactive worktags: [values]
You can't specify an Employee worktag and a Contingent Worker worktag for the same line.
These worktags aren't valid for the specified plan structure: [worktags].
Specify a value for the Organizing Dimension: [Organization Dimension Type].
